title: Add New Car Type (Type 5) Requiring Options 0 and 1
natural_language: Add a new car type (Type 5) that requires both Option 0 (air-conditioning) and Option 1 (sunroof). Ensure all sequence and capacity constraints remain satisfied.
expected_change: Extend the model by adding one additional car type requiring Options 0 and 1. Update demand and requires matrices accordingly.
evaluation_goal: Verify that the new car type appears in the sequence the correct number of times and that all option window constraints remain satisfied.
